sentences.en: PLAYER. Unknown. Enigmatic . Signs cloudy. Unproven. Heed.
sentences.cn: 你是未知, 是迷幻,是阴云笼罩中的浅影,是未经证实的忠诚,我会留意你的举动.

sentences.en: Such a relationship is presently unproven.
sentences.cn: 这种相互关系尚未证实.

sentences.en: There are a lot of unproven allegations flying around.
There's no such thing as an unproven track record.
sentences.cn: 根本不存在这种未被证实的记录.

sentences.en: Utilities refuse to build any, since the technology is expensive and unproven.
sentences.cn: 由于该技术投资巨大而又未得到证实, 从效用的角度来说不宜建造此类发电厂.

words.tran_cn: 未经检验的；未经证明的
